NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/DIV.I(Weapon) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :  12  /03 /2012 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.   08 / 2012 
 
 
Subject :   Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by the   
                  General Manager, Field Gun Factory, Kalpi Road, Kanpur. 
 
 
 
 
A copy of DGCA permit  number 64-AA/2012, issued under reference  
No.8/70/2008-IR dated 16-02-2012 regarding authorization to the General 
Manager, Field Gun Factory, Kalpi Road, Kanpur  for carriage of arms & 
ammunition, consigned to the licensed dealers by air within the territory of 
India, is forwarded herewith for information and necessary action by all 
concerned.  
 
2. 
 
Unless suspended or revoked earlier, this permit shall remain valid till   
31- 12 - 2012.  
 
3. 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).  
 
Encl:     
As above.  
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
